physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1047 Denver Golf and Tennis.'' On back of photograph: ''Sid and Sam Milstein owned Denver Golf & Tennis forerunner of Aspen Leaf, #1047.''

mods.abstract: View of front of Denver Golf and Tennis store from across the street in Denver, Colorado. Brothers Sid and Sam Milstein owned the store which was later known as the Aspen Leaf.
